languages.text: {n}Мехадендрит Паскаля выдвигает тонкую иглу-бур, поблескивающую священной смазкой. Под звуки арии очищения кода она погружается в череп одержимого техножреца, прикасается к нейроаугменту, образует с ним электрическую цепь. На лице отражается мучительное напряжение, из вокса льются яростные литании.{/n} "Результат неуспешен. Запрашиваю помощь".

{n}Pasqal's mechadendrite extends a thin drilling needle. Sacred unguent glistens on it. A code purification aria is heard as the needle sinks into the possessed Tech-Priest's skull and touches his neural augmetic, forming an electric circuit with it. Extreme strain is visible on his face. Furious litanies pour out of his vox.{/n} "Result: failure. Requesting assistance."
languages.original_text: {n}Мехадендрит Паскаля выдвигает тонкую иглу-бур, поблескивающую священной смазкой. languages.text: {n}Aus Pasqals Mechadendrit fährt eine dünne Bohrnadel. Heiliges Salböl glänzt darauf. Es ist eine Arie der Codereinigung zu hören, als die Nadel in den Schädel des besessenen Techpriesters eindringt und seine neurale Augmentation berührt, um einen elektrischen Schaltkreis mit ihr zu bilden. Auf seinem Gesicht ist extreme Anspannung zu erkennen. Zornige Litaneien strömen aus seinem Vox.{/n} "Ergebnis: Fehlschlag. Erbitte Unterstützung."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrite extends a thin drilling needle. Sacred unguent glistens on it. A code purification aria is heard as the needle sinks into the possessed Tech-Priest's skull and touches his neural augmetic, forming an electric circuit with it. Extreme strain is visible on his face. Furious litanies pour out of his vox.{/n} "Result: failure. Requesting assistance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus Pasqals Mechadendrit fährt eine dünne Bohrnadel. Heiliges Salböl glänzt darauf. Es ist eine Arie der Codereinigung zu hören, als die Nadel in den Schädel des besessenen Techpriesters eindringt und seine neurale Augmentation berührt, um einen elektrischen Schaltkreis mit ihr zu bilden. Auf seinem Gesicht ist extreme Anspannung zu erkennen. Zornige Litaneien strömen aus seinem Vox.{/n} "Ergebnis: Fehlschlag. Erbitte Unterstützung."

languages.text: {n}La mécadendrite de Pasqal fait apparaître une fine mèche de forage sur laquelle brille un onguent sacré. Une aria de purification du code retentit lorsque l'aiguille plonge dans le crâne du technoprêtre possédé et touche son augmétique neural, formant ainsi un circuit électrique. Une tension extrême se lit sur son visage et des litanies furieuses se déversent de son vox.{/n} « Résultat : échec. Demande d'assistance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrite extends a thin drilling needle. Sacred unguent glistens on it. A code purification aria is heard as the needle sinks into the possessed Tech-Priest's skull and touches his neural augmetic, forming an electric circuit with it. Extreme strain is visible on his face. Furious litanies pour out of his vox.{/n} "Result: failure. Requesting assistance."

Une aria de purification du code retentit lorsque l'aiguille plonge dans le crâne du technoprêtre possédé et touche son augmétique neural, formant ainsi un circuit électrique. Une tension extrême se lit sur son visage et des litanies furieuses se déversent de son vox.{/n} « Résultat : échec. Demande d'assistance. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须伸出一根细细的钻针，圣油在上面闪闪发光。钻针刺入技术神甫的头骨，接触到他的神经植入物，形成了回路，你听到帕斯卡吟唱了一段净化咏叹调，但随后，他的脸上露出了极度的焦虑表情，怒气冲冲的祷文从他的音阵装置中倾泻而出。{/n}“操作结果：失败，正在请求援助。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrite extends a thin drilling needle. Sacred unguent glistens on it. A code purification aria is heard as the needle sinks into the possessed Tech-Priest's skull and touches his neural augmetic, forming an electric circuit with it. Extreme strain is visible on his face. Furious litanies pour out of his vox.{/n} "Result: failure. Requesting assistance."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须伸出一根细细的钻针，圣油在上面闪闪发光。钻针刺入技术祭司的头骨，接触到他的神经植入物，形成了回路，你听到帕斯卡吟唱了一段净化咏叹调，但随后，他的脸上露出了极度的焦虑表情，怒气冲冲的祷文从他的音阵装置中倾泻而出。{/n}“操作结果：失败，正在请求援助。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルは機械触手から細いドリル針を伸ばす。先端で、神聖なる軟膏がキラリと光る。コード浄化の詠唱を唱え始めると、針がはりつけになっている技術司祭の頭蓋骨へと沈み、男の神経オーグメティックに触れることで電気回路を形成していく。パスカルの顔はひどく緊張していた。そのヴォクスから荒れ狂った連祷が溢れる。{/n}「結果：失敗。協力を要求する」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrite extends a thin drilling needle. Sacred unguent glistens on it. A code purification aria is heard as the needle sinks into the possessed Tech-Priest's skull and touches his neural augmetic, forming an electric circuit with it. Extreme strain is visible on his face. Furious litanies pour out of his vox.{/n} "Result: failure. Requesting assistance."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは機械触手から小さな穴あけ針を伸ばす。先端に神聖なる軟膏がキラリと光った。コード浄化の詠唱を唱え始めると、針は張り付けの技術司祭の頭蓋骨に沈んで、男の神経オーグメティックに触れることで電気回路を形成する。パスカルの顔はひどく緊張していた。そのヴォクスから荒れ狂った連祷が溢れる。{/n}「結果：失敗。協力を要求する」

languages.text: {n}La mecadendrita de Pasqal extiende una fina aguja perforadora. El ungüento sagrado brilla en él. Se oye un aria de purificación de códigos cuando la aguja se hunde en el cráneo del tecnosacerdote poseído y toca su aumético neural, formando un circuito eléctrico con él. En su rostro se aprecia una gran tensión. Furiosas letanías brotan de su voco.{/n} «Resultado: fallo. Se solicita asistencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrite extends a thin drilling needle. Sacred unguent glistens on it. A code purification aria is heard as the needle sinks into the possessed Tech-Priest's skull and touches his neural augmetic, forming an electric circuit with it. Extreme strain is visible on his face. Furious litanies pour out of his vox.{/n} "Result: failure. Requesting assistance."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mecadendrita de Pasqal extiende una fina aguja perforadora. El ungüento sagrado brilla en él. Se oye un aria de purificación de códigos cuando la aguja se hunde en el cráneo del tecnosacerdote poseído y toca su aumético neural, formando un circuito eléctrico con él. En su rostro se aprecia una gran tensión. Furiosas letanías brotan de su voco.{/n} «Resultado: fallo. Se solicita asistencia».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın mekadentritinden, üzeri kutsal özyağ ile parlayan ince bir matkap iğnesi çıkıyor. İğnenin ele geçirilen Tekno Rahip'in kafasına saplanıp sinirsel ogmetiğine ulaşmasıyla bir elektrik devresi oluşuyor. Tüm bunlar olurken de bir kod arındırma aryası duyuluyor. Pasqal'ın gösterdiği aşırı çaba, gerilmiş yüzünden okunuyor. Voksundan haşin dualar dökülüyor.{/n} "Sonuç: Başarısız. Destek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's mechadendrite extends a thin drilling needle. Sacred unguent glistens on it. A code purification aria is heard as the needle sinks into the possessed Tech-Priest's skull and touches his neural augmetic, forming an electric circuit with it. Extreme strain is visible on his face. Furious litanies pour out of his vox.{/n} "Result: failure. Requesting assistance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın mekadentritinden ince bir matkap iğnesi çıkıyor. Kutsal özyağ, iğnenin üzerinde parıldıyor. İğne, ele geçirilen Tekno Rahip'in kafatasına saplanıp sinirsel ogmetiğine ulaştığında bir kod arındırma aryası duyuluyor, bir elektrik devresi oluşturuyor. Gerginliği, yüzünden okunuyor. Voksundan haşin ilahiler dökülüyor.{/n} "Sonuç: Başarısız. Destek talep ediliyor."
